Articles.Content: Heeellloooo everybody! Around a week ago I started playing ksp, and I just made my forum account late last night. I mostly play in sandbox mode, to experiment with stuff. So far I've been able to land on Mun and Minmus a couple times and Duna once. Kerbal Space Program is an amazing game, 10/10
Welcome to the forums! Glad to hear you've been enjoying yourself. Make yourself at home!
We got cookies, cake, pepsi and coke products, and some stand-up comedy on the TV!
